articles.title: Reversed With a Single Drug – “Incurable” Liver Disease May Be Curable - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A new study from Sanford Burnham Prebys has discovered a drug that can spur liver regeneration in patients with Alagille syndrome. For the first time, research conducted by Associate Professor Duc Dong, Ph.D. has revealed that the detrimental effects of Alagi…
articles.content: Alagille syndrome is a genetic disorder that affects the liver, heart, and other parts of the body. It is characterized by a reduction in the number of bile ducts within the liver, leading to bile ac… [+4272 chars]
